dodatak.opisDodatka: The DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controller defines the new generation of play, combining revolutionary features with an intuitive design and precise controls.The new models feature a stylish matte finish, show your light bar from above and allow you to control your PS4™ via USB cable as well as through Bluetooth®.You can also use your controller with compatible applications on Windows®PC/Mac – connect via USB cable or with Bluetooth® using the DUALSHOCK®4 USB wireless adaptor*1.
